transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Hanji.
Executive: Ji Aslam sir baat kar rahe hain?
Ji IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi sir, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Kal bhi aapne phone kiya itni der chalu rakha aur phir aapne kaat diya saamne se.
Executive: Sir I'm so sorry to disturb you actually main Muskan Dutta ke manager baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Muskan ji bol rahe ho?
Executive: Nahi sir main unke manager Ashma baat, sir main unke manager Ashma baat kar rahi hu. Aapne unke liye feedback galat diya tha uske liye maine aapko call kiya hai ki kya issue aa raha hai sir aapke jo feedback not.
Customer: Maine galat isiliye diya kal mere se baat chalu rakhi unhone bola meri baat suniye. Example ke taur pe product batao. Bola phone cut mat karna, theek hai? Phir 15 minute tak phone chalu raha koi reply nahi aaya aur khud ba khud phone cut ho gaya. Ab main kaisa feedback achcha du bolo.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Toh aapne unse baat nahi kara?
Nahi pehle baat hui unhone bola sab check karte hain beech mein phone cut mat karna, main bola theek hai.
Theek hai toh woh khud. Kyun toh aap busy the kya?
Nahi nahi. Nahi nahi aap busy the kya?
Nahi main thodi busy tha maine toh phone chalu rakha tha.
Executive: Ji achcha.
Customer: Haan toh unhone kuch bola main check karti hu aap thodi der phone chalu rakhiye 5 minute mein kaam ho jayega. Toh main bola theek hai phone chalu tha beech mein reply nahi aaya 15 minute tak phone chalu raha aur phir cut ho gaya khud ba khud, theek hai? Aur phir mujhe aisa message aaya ki bhai aapka feedback kya hai toh main kaise feedback achcha du bolo.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir bilkul galat baat hai yeh toh unki main unse complaint karungi is cheez ke regarding sir. Aap mujhe batao sir IndiaMART se aap services dekh rahe ho kaisa chal raha hai business?
Customer: Nahi unhone mujhe jor jor se abhi chalu karwaaya mera toh pura renew karwane ka koi interest hi nahi tha unhone bataya 3 mahine mein agar aapka refund nahi mila toh hum log payment.
Executive: Sir lekin 3 mahine ka woh tab hoga jab aap isko use karoge. Aap ise use hi nahi kar rahe ho toh sir kaise business aayega?
Customer: Meri baat toh suniye yaar puri baat nahi khatam hone dete usse pehle aap jaane lagte ho.
Executive: Sorry sir sorry bataiye.
Customer: Meri baat suno dekho kal in logo ka phone aaya ke aapki service aaj se online ho gayi hai, theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Unhone baat ki toh maine bola theek hai phir bola kuch kaam karna hai toh main bola sab theek hai chalo chalu karo toh woh bole 15 minute kya matlab 5 minute chalu rakho main dekh leti hu phir repeat baat karte hain phone mat kaatna mat, theek hai woh baat hui. Toh phone khud ba khud 15 minute ke baad cut ho gaya koi baat hi nahi hui aur aaj bhi dekho maine byleads waise bhi purchase kiye hain dekho subah se 3 se 4 byleads maine purchase kiye hain.
Executive: Ek minute sir main dekh leti hu. Dekho aap dekho.
Han han.
Customer: Theek hai toh ab dekho saamne se reply sahi nahi aayega jinhone mujhe chalu karwaaya wohi mujhse aise karenge toh kaise kaam hoga pata hai? Unke bharose mein tha unhone bola 3 mahine refund hoga toh agar yeh aise baat hogi toh kaise mujhe toh koi unhone bola 3 mahine refund hoga.
Executive: Sorry sorry sorry.
Customer: Ji ji woh bilkul baat theek hai lekin aap mujhe batao. Sir mujhe ek baat nahi nahi woh baat ab theek hai lekin ek baat mujhe batao.
Aapne yeh jo lead purchase kari hai yeh saari relevant hai aapke?
Customer: Haan woh relevant thi tabhi toh maine purchase ki na. Adrak saari hai banarasi saari hai. Aapne inse baat kari?
Han baat kari. Ab baat hui in logo se? Bola baad mein baat, baat toh hui.
Kisi se baat hui kisi ne phone nahi uthaya woh toh theek hai chalta rehta hai lekin jo mera kaam karne wale wohi sahi nahi rahenge toh main kya karunga?
Executive: Sir aap is number ko note kar lijiyega agar future mein ab main aapka ek abhi WhatsApp group bana rahi hu. Kabhi bhi aapka Muskan ke saath koi problem aati hai aap us group pe daalna seedha message mere paas aayega main apne aap baat kar lungi sir us cheez ke liye. Theek hai aap bilkul bhi is cheez se bemat karna ki kisi bhi tarike se aapko galat aap service, aap humare client hain sir hume aapko.
Bilkul sir is cheez pe main definitely action lungi is cheez ka main abhi aapke saamne hi baat karungi agar aap chahe toh. Main is cheez pe definitely action lungi sir but. Mujhe ek kaam karo. Wahi yeh ki aap please naraz mat hoiye is cheez se.
Customer: Nahi naraz nahi ho raha meri baat suno. Ab aap mujhe ek kaam karo jaise aap unhone bataya 3 mahine mein agar aapka refund nahi hua toh uska mere paas kya proof rahega bhai nahi hua tab main kaise refund lunga? Woh bata de mujhe.
Executive: Koi nahi sir uska process yeh hota hai na process samjha dete hain. Main kar du. Dekho main. Sir 3 mahine 3 mahine ki dijiye main aapko bata deti hu IndiaMART ki policy hai ki agar aapko result nahi milta kabhi bhi refund maang sakte hain toh pehla policy, theek hai? Dusra point. Yeh koi risk dene ki baat wali nahi hai sir.
Customer: Toh phir kaise phir aap log bologe aisa nahi hota phir main kya karunga? Nahi nahi sir hum chahenge sir aapko business mile hum kyun chahenge sir?
Toh phir yeh pehli baar mein. Meri call kiya hi isiliye. Nahi nahi nahi sir sorry sir is cheez ke liye sir main abhi. Kaam, kaam chhod ke baitha tha phir bhi koi reply phir dimag toh ghumega na aadmi ka. Koi nahi aap line pe rahiye sir ek minute aap line pe rahiye main usko line pe hi leti hu. Nahi abhi koi.
Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay.
Executive: Bolo. Muskan. Bolo. Han Muskan. Haan sun rahi hu bolo toh sahi. Aslam sir line pe hain Muskan aapne kal sir ko phone kiya aur 5 minute aise hi rakha tumne bola bas side mein rakh kar ke main kaam kar rahi hu aur aap bolo mat koi baat nahi aur tumne baat tak nahi kari. Yeh kya chal raha hai haan? Kaun Aslam sir?
Customer: Kuch creations se.
Executive: Sir kisne bola aisa?
Customer: Main bol raha hu aapka phone aaya kal mere paas. Mere paas recording bhi hai mam. Aapka call back. Aapne mujhe kya bola aapne mujhe phone meri baat suniye bolo. Main sun rahi hu aap 5 minute ke liye mujhe time do maine inke product add bhi kiya aap dekho toh sahi. Aap unki baat suno pehle woh kya bol rahe hain. Bolo sir aap.
Executive: Sir madam dekho aapne kal mujhe phone kiya theek hai main bola theek hai chalo kaam chalu karte hain aapne bola aapka sab online chal start ho gaya hai, theek hai? Toh main bola theek hai aapne bola bhai phone beech mein aapne kya bola beech mein phone cut aapne bola beech mein phone mat kaatna toh ab main kaam aapka sab adjust kar rahi hu, theek hai? Toh maine phone chalu rakha uske baad koi reply nahi aaya nahi koi aapne baat ki bas aise hi chalu raha 15 minute aur khud ba khud phone cut ho gaya. Yeh bhi maine whatsapp pe screenshot bheja hai aapke saamne main aapko dikha deti hu. Mujhe koi screenshot nahi aaya mam.
Yeh dekho. Main aapko dikhati hu. Wait karo, theek hai? Next maine check kiya toh next mein Siliguri premium blend loose ki hui hai. Isme photo bhi sahi hai toh isko maine delete kari, theek hai? Next. Achcha achcha okay ab main premium hata deti hu Siliguri premium dono hata deti hu.
Hello. Main blended kar deti hu. Haan sir ek minute woh apne saath screenshot share kariye. Aap mujhe check karke batao aapko receive hua nahi hua?
Nahi ek minute. Blended loose, theek hai? Check karo sir aapke saath hi kiya hai. Check karo sir. Haan ji. Abhi tak koi nahi aaya mujhe. Premium next blended premium bhi dekh. Hata deti hu. Achcha mere paas se chala gaya.
Abhi tak koi message nahi aaya.
Haan woh toh message hi kar rahi hu. Chaliye yeh wala bhi maine aapke saath mein delete kar diya. Muskan ek kaam karo sir ka na ek WhatsApp group bana do aur jo bhi conversation karogi waha pe karna, theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai sir aaj se baad koi bhi conversation hogi aapki us group pe hogi. Koi bhi problem hoti hai aap waha pe message karenge, theek hai? Ab dekho, abhi dekho inhone kya bola kal maine update kiya tha theek hai toh yeh abhi kal ka koi status dekh lo aapko screenshot bhej du bolo toh mera yeh phone ka. Aapko call ka. Kal koi message nahi aaya.
Koi baat nahi sir main dekh leti hu woh cheez. Don't worry. Next time agar yeh cheez repeat hoti hai I will definitely take action on her. Aap abhi ke liye main aapko update kar rahi hu. Theek hai. Bilkul bilkul sir. Theek hai? Aur agar aap meri call se satisfied hai toh please satisfied dijiyega aur koi toh issue nahi hai sir aapko iske alawa? Nahi dekho hum logo ko satisfied humko dene mein kya harz hai kal aisa hua isiliye maine usko aise click kiya. Aap samajh rahe ho dekho yeh bol rahe the kal maine photo dala mujhe koi photo nahi aaya. Abhi aaya hai dekho yeh photo dala hai. Maine abhi itna kar diya sir ek baar aap check kar lijiye. Theek hai. Main dekh lungi abhi main group aapka kar deti hu. Okay. Theek hai? Thank you sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received poor service from Muskan.

- Phone disconnected without resolution.

- Doubts about refund policy and proof.

- No photo received despite claim of upload.



Resolution:

- Apologized for the poor service.

- Promised to take action against Muskan.

- Created a WhatsApp group for direct communication.

- Clarified refund policy and process.

- Confirmed photo received.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will monitor the WhatsApp group.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, whatsapp group, complaint, service, follow up
